Title: The Promise
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Graham Yost, Fred Golan, Dave Andron, Benjamin Cavell, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Jere Burns, Joelle Carter
Plot: Raylan is captured by the authorities, but Art reluctantly lets him go and puts him back on the case. Avery gets to Ava and questions her about his missing money, but she winds up leading Boyd straight to them.
